meanings.definition: A person or organization that employs people.
meanings.sent1: The employer at the store hired me to help customers.
meanings.sent2: My employer provides health insurance for all employees.
meanings.sent3: The employer accidentally wore mismatched socks to the important meeting.
meanings.sent4: She was the employer of a team of talented designers, guiding them to success.
meanings.sent5: The employer's kind smile made the workplace feel welcoming and friendly.

meanings.definition: A person or company that hires and pays people to work.
meanings.sent1: The new employer in town is looking for skilled workers to join the team.
meanings.sent2: As an employer, it is important to treat your employees with respect.
meanings.sent3: The employer brought in donuts for everyone on Fridays to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: She was known as a fair employer, always paying her workers on time.
meanings.sent5: The employer's office was filled with awards for being a top employer in the city.
